price: 3. Zoals Allah aan jou (o, Mohammed) heeft geopenbaard en aan degenen vóór jou dat Allah de Almachtige, de Alwijze is.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa-ilā alladhīna min qablika al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
